remarks: The function operation expressed as a mapping, variation of ~ offval2 . (Contributed by SO, 15-Jul-2018.)
statement:
offval22.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
offval22.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. W ) $.
offval22.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> C e. X ) $.
offval22.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A /\ y e. B ) -> D e. Y ) $.
offval22.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) ) $.
offval22.g $e |- ( ph -> G = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> D ) ) $.
offval22 $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> ( C R D ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d R x y $.
$d ph x y $.
